header.title: Parsetools Release Notes

item.p: The source code was cleaned up from unused variables to eliminate compiler warnings. No other changes.
Correction in yeccpre.hrl to give correct syntax error info when the offending token was of the form {Class, Line, Value}.
The yecc function does now accept atoms in the Grammarfile, Parserfile and Includefile arguments.

section.title: Parsetools 1.0
section.p: There are no changes since Erlang 4.3.
